head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RAUCH, EDWARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RAUCH, EDWARD J.

block.p: RAUCH-Edward J. On September 20, 2000 of Bergenfield, NJ. Brother of Marie DuLaney, Blanche Landman, Eleanor Staub, Dorothy Schaffner, Grace Rauch-Dincin, the late Margaret Schaffner, Julia Perrine and Anna Farrar. Uncle of 13 nephews and nieces and 22 grand-nieces & nephews. Funeral liturgy at Saint John's RC Church, Bergenfield, New Jersey, on Saturday, 10:00 AM. Cremation, Laurel Grove Crematory, Totowa, N.J. Visiting Friday, 2:00-4:00 and 7:009:00 PM at Riewerts Memorial Home, 187 South Washington Avenue, Bergenfield, NJ. Donations may be made to Bergenfield/ Dumont Rotary Club.
